CustomField.description: For ADR Tabs report: Campaign and Events
CustomField.formula: ( Contact.Account.Status__c = "New" || Contact.Account.Status__c = "Attempting" || Contact.Account.Status__c = "Assigned" || Contact.Account.Status__c = "Contact Established" ) && NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Contact.Status__c), "Delete")) && NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Contact.Status__c), "No Authority")) && ( CONTAINS(Contact.Owner.UserRole.Name, "SMB") && ( Campaign.Event_Campaign__c = TRUE && Campaign.IsActive = TRUE ) || ( Campaign.Email_Campaign__c = TRUE && TEXT(Status) = "Responded" && Campaign.IsActive = TRUE ) || Contact.Account.Active_Growth_Campaigns_on_Account__c > 0 ) || ( CONTAINS(Contact.Owner.UserRole.Name, "ADR") && Campaign.Event_Campaign__c = TRUE && Campaign.IsActive = TRUE && ABS(Contact.Follow_Up_Date__c - TODAY()) < 0 )
CustomField.label: Tabs: Campaign and Events
